==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Al Azif''|ar=العزيف}} is the original Arabic name for the {{w|Necronomicon}}, a fictional tome of forbidden knowledge first mentioned in the {{w|H. P. Lovecraft}} short story ''{{w|The Hound}}''. Lovecraft defines the word as "that nocturnal sound (made by insects) supposed to be the howling of demons" in his brief pseudo-history of the Necronomicon published after his death, as "{{w|History of the Necronomicon}}."
